com.manyangled.gibbous.optim.convex

Class BarrierOptimizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.commons.math3.optim.BaseOptimizer<PAIR>
      • org.apache.commons.math3.optim.BaseMultivariateOptimizer<org.apache.commons.math3.optim.PointValuePair>
        • org.apache.commons.math3.optim.nonlinear.scalar.MultivariateOptimizer
          • com.manyangled.gibbous.optim.convex.ConvexOptimizer
            • com.manyangled.gibbous.optim.convex.BarrierOptimizer

  • public class BarrierOptimizer
extends ConvexOptimizer
    An optimizer that can minimize a convex function in the presence of a set of convex inequality constraints and linear equality constraints.

    An implementation of the Barrier Method (Algorithm 11.1) from Convex Optimization, Boyd and Vandenberghe, Cambridge University Press, 2008.

    BarrierOptimizer supports the following OptimizationData parameters as arguments to optimize(OptimizationData...):

    • convex objective function: ObjectiveFunction - mandatory: must contain a TwiceDifferentiableFunction
    • initial guess: InitialGuess - mandatory: must be strictly feasible w.r.t. all inequality constraints.
    • convex inequality constraints: InequalityConstraintSet - optional
    • linear inequality constraints: LinearInequalityConstraint - optional
    • linear equality constraints: LinearEqualityConstraint - optional
    • convergence epsilon: ConvergenceEpsilon - optional
    • objective scale factor: BarrierMu - optional
    • inner optimizer parameters: InnerOptimizationData - optional: passed down to NewtonOptimizer inner calls.

    NOTE: all parameters to optimize(OptimizationData...) are also passed to NewtonOptimizer, and so for example setting ConvergenceEpsilon here will also set it for inner calls to NewtonOptimizer. However, any settings passed via InnerOptimizationData are applied last for NewtonOptimizer, and so will have precedence.
